title: My pixel XL has been acting weird every since I bought it not only will in not update security fix
content: My pixel XL will not let me install the security updates that my phone is needed matter of fact I have never got to run one on wifi nor data and anytime I'm in middle of anything on my phone rather it's texting or messenger Google the notification bar at too drops down in the way it's getting very annoying  any thoughts or ways to fix it it's still under warranty I assume under year old
